reviews.text:
Didn't snag photos. 
But I ordered the popper and Monte cristo they offer half sizes which where both huge and each came with a side. Eyes were bigger than...
This was my first visit to this location, and I ordered carry out online.   I'm a big fan of some of the other Melt locations but this experience was very...

We had the mushroom melt and chicken parm 
Service was great. Our waitress was helpful in menu decisions. 
Food wasn't bad but didn't meet my expectations....
